de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.mapping

Interface IPropertyMapper


  • public interface IPropertyMapper
    Defines how the structural process of writing and reading of a field is performed. Technically there are existing 3 relevant IPropertyMapper:
    • pure property: the content of the given field is transformed from / into the needed format and written directly as content of the IStoreObject or the mapper
    • referenced: the content of the field is written / fetched somewehere else ( another table / column etc. ). When writing into the IDataStore, this property is replaced by an identifyer. When reading, the object is loaded and created from the other position again
    • embedded: the content of the field is written / read completely into / from the field as a substructure.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fromObjectReference(java.lang.Object entity, IObjectReference reference, io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Void>> handler)
      This method resolves the given IObjectReference into the real value and stores this value inside the IField of the given entity
      <T> void fromStoreObject(T entity, IStoreObject<T,?> storeObject, IField field, io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Void>> handler)
      This method fetches the content for the given field from the IStoreObject, changes it into the propriate value ( normally by using an ITypeHandler ) and stores this value inside the entity into the given field
      <T> void intoStoreObject(T entity, IStoreObject<T,?> storeObject, IField field, io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Void>> handler)
      place the content of the given IField into the IStoreObject
      <T> void readForStore(T entity, IField field, io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Object>> handler)
      This method reads the field value of the entity and converts the value into a suitable format for the datastore

        place the content of the given IField into the IStoreObject
        Parameters:
        entity - the mapper object to be handled
        storeObject - the instance of IStoreObject where the content shall be placed
